keyMoments.title: Win Groggy Ring Match
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates, represented by Zoro and Sanji, defeat the Foxy Pirates' Groggy Monsters team in the second round of the Davy Back Fight.
keyMoments.significance: Secures victory in the second round and gives Luffy the right to reclaim a crew member or item from the Foxy Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Chooses Shelly Instead of Chopper
keyMoments.description: After winning, Luffy makes the surprising decision to reclaim Tonjit's horse Shelly rather than immediately rescuing crew member Chopper.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's compassion for others and sets up the final round where Luffy must rescue Chopper.

keyMoments.title: Groggy Monsters Use Illegal Weapons
keyMoments.description: The Foxy Pirates' Groggy Monsters team uses illegal weapons (clubs, swords, and giant pans) during the Groggy Ring match while the biased referee looks away.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's reliance on cheating and underhanded tactics in the Davy Back Fight.

keyMoments.title: Groggy Monsters Suffer First-Ever Loss
keyMoments.description: The Foxy Pirates' previously undefeated Groggy Monsters team loses to Zoro and Sanji in the Groggy Ring, marking their first-ever Davy Back Fight defeat.
keyMoments.significance: Historic loss for the Foxy Pirates' strongest team, forcing them to give up Shelly to the Straw Hats.
